description:
I’m just asking...
Why are Governments all around the world,
advising people to wear face masks -
in some cases for the sake of business!
When there are NO studies to show
and prove this is safe?
Even the CDC website doesn’t say they’ve done
the study to make sure it’s safe.
Why is people’s health being put at risk,
when it’s known these masks can and do cause more harm? #secondplandemic
Why aren’t people being made aware of the risks?
Why is it easy to find evidence that masks cause harm but very shady and “she’ll be right”
kind of approach when it comes to
supporting masks for covid.
Which btw, #covidfullofshit
You can find links in @tays_way_ original
post on #masks
#maskoff
#medicalfreedom #prochoice #informedconsent #doUtrusturgovt #freedomkeepers #questioneverything #justaskingaustralia #prochoice #investigate #dothestudy #notsorry #believemothers #injuryisreal #newworldorder #smartgrid #zombieapocalypse
📸 : @manea.meansbeautiful 🙏🏾
